<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preach'd before the King at St. James's, April 16, 1696 being a day of publick thanksgiving for the discovery of a horrid design to assassinate His Majesty's person, and for the deliverance of the Nation from a French invasion / by ... John, Lord Bishop of Norwich. Moore, John, 1646-1714.
36 p.
Printed for Will. Rogers ..., London : 1696.
Advertisement: p. 36. Includes bibliographical references. Cover and half-title: The Bishop of Norwich's thanksgiving-sermon before the King at St. James's, April 16, 1696. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
A sermon preach'd before the King at St. James's, April 16, 1696 being a day of publick thanksgiving for the discovery of a horrid design to assassinate His Majesty's person, and for the deliverance of the Nation from a French invasion / by ... John, Lord Bishop of Norwich. Moore, John, 1646-1714.
36 p.
Printed for Will. Rogers ..., London : 1696.
Advertisement: p. 36. Includes bibliographical references. Cover and half-title: The Bishop of Norwich's thanksgiving-sermon before the King at St. James's, April 16, 1696. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Will. Rogers
